page.title: 09MOBILE TRADE
page.content: Every Wednesday from 5-30 to 7-00 the fish and chip van can be seen outside the Village Hall.It travels about 40 miles a week. The owners buy their chips from Warrem and Morton.The fish they buy in Kent. Trade is as good here as any other village.They sell 70 portions of fish and chips. Trade is best in Autumn, then Spring then last of all Summer. The prices are fish and chips Â£1.20. Every Thursday the fruit and vegetable man visits.He travels from Braintree and his average mileage is 144-196.He collects his produce at 3a.m from Spital Fields,London.Trade here has increased with the new houses.The most expensive fruit is melon and vegetable asparagus.He sells mostly potatoes and more fruit than vegetables.He has been in trade with the van for 2yrs 3mth.He enjoys his job and finishes at 6pm.
